about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate about technology and development, always seeking to learn and evolve

story.title: My Journey
story.p1: I am a professional graduated as an IT Technician from UNIVAP (2024), passionate about technology and web development. My journey began with programming in languages like Java, C#, Python, JavaScript and PHP, always seeking to combine creativity and logic to solve real problems.
story.p2: I have experience in ASP.NET Web Forms and Windows Forms, working since February 2025 as a Programmer at APTIV, where I develop and maintain applications to support internal processes, dashboards and integration with relational databases.
story.p3: My passion for web development led me to explore modern frameworks, such as React, and front-end libraries, in addition to deepening my knowledge in relational and non-relational databases. I believe that the combination between robust back-end and dynamic front-end is essential to deliver complete, scalable and intuitive solutions.

aptiv.title: Programmer
aptiv.description: Development in ASP.NET Web Forms and Windows Forms, maintenance of internal systems, management reports and SQL Server integration.
